title: pulsefire ezreal icon
body:
still haven't received my ezreal icon yet {{item:3070}} 
when will they be released?

replies.body: We're still distributing icons!  We're nearly wrapped up, just give us another day or so per the [announcement page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pulsefire-caitlyn) (comment section).  The goodies will come!
